protocol.name: P-G4022-1
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a phytotron with a 14h day / 10h night. Temperature: 20Â°C / 16Â°C. Humidity: 60% / 75%. Lightintensity: .

protocol.name: P-G4022-2
protocol.text: Source leaves were cut at the end of the day from non-flowering plants. Leaf peteoles were recut under buffer (2mM MES, pH6.5) and placed in buffer + 100mM sorbitol for 13hours in the dark. After incubation discs were snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-G4022-4
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction using TRIzol Total RNA Isolation Reagent, according to the protocol supplied by the manufacturer GibcoBRL Life-Technologies.

protocol.name: P-G4022-5
protocol.text: Source leaves were cut at the end of the day from non-flowering plants. Leaf peteoles were recut under buffer (2mM MES, pH6.5) and placed in buffer + 100mM sucrose for 13hours in the dark. After incubation discs were snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen.
